item.title: Supreme Court allows NGOs facing Gaza ban to keep operating, for now
item.summary: Some 17 NGOs and the Association of International Development Agencies (AIDA) sought an urgent suspension of the ban in a petition to the High Court of Justice.

item.title: Huckabee tells US Embassy staff in Israel to leave today amid Iran strike fears
item.summary: Multiple countries have urged nationals in Israel to exercise extreme caution, including China, France, and Italy, while others urged citizens to leave Iran, including the UK, Canada, and Australia

item.title: IDF Brig. Gen. says still no change to public guidelines amid Iran tensions
item.summary: "The IDF is closely monitoring the situation in Iran and is alert and prepared to defend you," he said in the video statement.

item.title: IDF says ceasefire violated in Rafah incident, conducts overnight strikes
item.summary: The IDF also said it carried out additional precise strikes overnight into Friday against several armed Hamas terrorists in the Rafah area.

item.title: Israeli elections: New poll shows Eisenkot gain, Bennett dip, blocs frozen at 60–50
item.summary: Despite shifts among individual party leaders, the overall balance between the blocs remains unchanged: 60 seats for the opposition and 50 for the coalition.

item.title: Far-right activists harass Arab-Israeli journalist outside her home
item.summary: At least 20 protesters stood at the entrance of the journalist’s apartment building, shouting slogans such as "Let the IDF win, fuck the Arabs,” and "Inshallah you have a heart attack."

item.title: Salvador Litvak brings his film 'Guns & Moses' to Israel
item.summary: Speaking about how he had decided to make the film, he said, “My wife, Nina, and I set out to make a Jewish mystery thriller in a world that Hollywood never depicts on film - our world."

item.title: From Israeli sitcoms to HBO hits: The best streaming picks for Purim
item.summary: TV Time: Purim is coming up, what should you watch to get in the spirit?

item.title: Left-wing activists hospitalized following settler attack in West Bank village
item.summary: The victims were taken to Beilinson Hospital in Petah Tikva to be treated for head injuries.

item.title: Israel 2048: New report by Henry Jackson Society looks at possible future strategy for Israel
item.summary: This is an important new contribution to the discussion about what comes next for Israel and the Middle East, rooting Israel’s strategy in Israel’s history and in the West.
